p: For the results validity of total carbon, the followed Certified reference materials were used: Soil Standard Silty OAS (Elemental Microanalysis Ltd., Okehampton, UK) and harbor sediments. AGLAE 19M 9.2 (AGLAE Association, Giberville, France). For TOC, we used Soil Standard Clay B2184 (Elemental Microanalysis Ltd., Okehampton, UK).
